body_html:
To force a build, stick "-w" as the first flag to be passed to the C compiler in the CMake***.txt file.
…

compiler in the CMake***.txt file.
…

body:
To force a build, stick "-w" as the first flag to be passed to the C
compiler in the CMake***.txt file.

On Mon, Jun 18, 2018 at 1:53 PM, Peter Goldsborough <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> From what I can see no-aligned-allocation-unavailable is a clang specific
> warning, so the above is probably the case. @orionr
> <https://github.com/orionr> maybe we need add certain flags to
> CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS only when the compiler is clang?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
